sentences: In Accra, the AWG-KP focused on analyzing the means available to reach emission reduction targets and is expected to continue these deliberations in Poznan.

However, the key focus in Poznan is expected to be a strategic discussion on all the elements of the AWG-KP work programme to guide the group s work towards reaching agreement in 2009 on Annex I parties further commitments.
The AWG-KP is also expected to discuss spillover effects and to develop a work plan for 2009.
The AWG-KP will convene a workshop on the mitigation potentials and ranges of emission reduction objectives.
